divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on Almshouse road heading into Newtown.I was about a quarter mile away from the intersection of Rt.232. It was a sunny day with no clouds in the sky.I had been looking up at the sky and had noticed birds and some aircraft flying several minutes prior to seeing the object.I then looked up at the sun and to its right,was what looked like a bright star in the sky.It looked really peculiar like it was out of place.The object was stationary and then began to move to the right,stopped-to the left,stopped and completely disappeared.This all happened in under a minute.This was not an aircraft due to the fact that it moved and stopped so fast.I felt no fear-before, during or after the event.I felt very peaceful while watching this object.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Richboro
There were no other sightings in Richboro on or around June 3rd 2008
